name: Gion
text: Your Turn Once Per Turn When your opponent activates an event, your opponent places one card from their hand at the bottom of their deck.

effect.text: When your opponent activates an event, your opponent places one card from their hand at the bottom of their deck.

meta.notes: Card is marked as a sample. Counter value is 2000. Rarity is UC (U and C next to each other in the box).
